images.usage: Showcasing the tropical summer experience in Thailand with stunning visuals of beaches and sunsets.
Highlighting special offers and discounts on flights to Thailand.
Highlighting special offers and discounts on flights to Thailand.
Decorative elements that enhance the tropical theme of the email.

images.alt_text: topless man sitting on cliff rock viewing Ko Nang Yuan isalnd, houses, and buildings under white and yellow sky

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Capturing the essence of summer vacations in Thailand with vibrant imagery of beaches and sunsets.
external_metadata.emotional_match: Inviting, tropical, and serene with elements of excitement and exoticism.

images.alt_text: a group of bowls with food in it

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Highlighting the exotic and appetizing aspects of Thai food to showcase local cuisine.
external_metadata.emotional_match: Inviting, tropical, and serene with elements of excitement and exoticism.

images.alt_text: people riding on blue kayak on river during daytime

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Illustrating the lively summer experience in Thailand, including outdoor activities and lush greenery.
external_metadata.emotional_match: Inviting, tropical, and serene with elements of excitement and exoticism.

images.alt_text: people riding on boat on river during daytime

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Representing the adventurous spirit of traveling in Thailand, appealing to travel enthusiasts.
external_metadata.emotional_match: Inviting, tropical, and serene with elements of excitement and exoticism.

images.alt_text: a swimming pool with lounge chairs next to it

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Conveying a sense of tranquility and relaxation associated with summer vacations in Thailand.
external_metadata.emotional_match: Inviting, tropical, and serene with elements of excitement and exoticism.

assetRequirements.content_context: Highlighting white sandy beaches, azure sea, and exotic cuisine

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Летние каникулы в Таиланде: незабываемые моменты ждут вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
